sql-set.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_storage ( txt TEXT, ts TIMESTAMP without timezone NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp )
SELECT txt FROM temp_storage ORDER BY ts

create or replace function sayHelloWorld() returns void language 'plpgsql' as $quote$
begin insert into temp_storage (txt) values ('I am saying: "Hello world, 你好世界"'); end
$quote$

create or replace function say_qu_with_str_str(s1 text, s2 text) returns void language 'plpgsql' as $quote$
begin insert into temp_storage (txt) values ('I am saying qu with str str: s1 = ' ||COALESCE(s1,'<NULL>')||', s2 = '||COALESCE(s2,'<NULL>')); end
$quote$

create or replace function say_qu_with_int_str(i1 int, s2 text) returns void language 'plpgsql' as $quote$
begin insert into temp_storage (txt) values ('I am saying qu with int str: i1 = '||i1||', s2 = '||s2); end
$quote$

create or replace function say_qu_with_long_long(long1 bigint, long2 bigint) returns void language 'plpgsql' as $quote$
begin insert into temp_storage (txt) values ('I am saying qu with long long: long1 = '||long1||', long2 = '||long2); end
$quote$

create or replace function say_qu_with_time_time(time1 timestamp without time zone, time2 timestamp without time zone) returns void language 'plpgsql' as $quote$
begin insert into temp_storage (txt) values ('I am saying qu with time time: time1 = ' ||COALESCE(''||time1,'<NULL>')||', time2 = '||COALESCE(''||time2,'<NULL>')); end
$quote$
